nodes.text: Caldra Prime was a location situated near Caldra Tertius. A number of trade worlds were located around Caldra Prime and Caldra Tertius. Around the time of the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, a group of pirates blazed a hyperspace route from the Vosch Cluster to the trade worlds around Caldra Prime and Caldra Tertius. The presence of the pirates threatened a portion of the fleet of the Rebel Alliance, which had escaped the battle, grouping at a rendezvous point in the Mid Rim that laid between the Vosch Cluster and the trade worlds.
Caldra Prime was mentioned in the short story "Rendezvous Point," written by Jason Fry and published in From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back in 2020.
